callout.message: WATCH OUT! There's Leet on the path!
You will have to...
...go around!
WATCH OUT! There's Leet on the path!
You will have to...
...go around!
Click on a green VERTEX to move your Noob!
Click on a green VERTEX to move your Noob!

buttons.onTray: right:1, straight:1

callout.message: This line is solved. A Noob can only walk on solved lines.
This line is solved. A Noob can only walk on solved lines.

buttons.onTray: right:1, straight:1, acute:1

callout.message: Unlock the angle to solve the lines connected to the angle.
This line is now solved.

buttons.onTray: right:1, straight:1, acute:1

callout.message: Unlock the angle to solve the lines connected to the angle.
This line is now solved.

callout.message: What is the measure of a straight line?

callout.message: Click on the cage to free the Noob!
Click on the cage to free the Noob!
Noobs cannot walk down CLOSED paths.
You will have to go around the long way!
Noobs cannot walk down CLOSED paths.
You will have to go around the long way!

buttons.onTray: right:99, acute:99, obtuse:99, straight:99

callout.message: Watch out! There's a Leet on the path!
Click the vertices to tell the Noob where to go.
Now you can get to the cage without hitting the Leet.

buttons.onTray: right:99, acute:99, obtuse:99, straight:99

callout.message: Click this right angle. It's locked.
Click the right angle rule to unlock the angle.
Click this right angle. It's locked.
Click the 90 degree angle button to unlock the angle.

buttons.onTray: acute:5, obtuse:5, right:5, straight:5

callout.message: Unlock the rest of the angles to open up a path.

callout.message: Unlock the rest of the angles to open up a path.

buttons.onTray: acute:5, obtuse:5, right:5, straight:5

callout.message: Oh no, that's a purple Leet! They will chase you if you open up the path, be careful!
Oh no, that's a purple Leet! They will chase you if you open up the path, be careful!
